jobDescription: trustaff is currently seeking an experienced Pre/Post Op RN for a 13-week travel contract.  The Pre / Post-Operative Registered Nurse (RN) is responsible for the admission of patients for surgical procedures, preparation for surgery and the coordination of pre-operative lab work. The Pre / Post-Operative RN will provide post-operative care and stabilization, prepare patient for return home, and act as discharge nurse giving thorough discharge education.  1+ year of recent Pre/Post Op RN experience is required **Most travel contracts include:13-week contractsMultiple Shifts Available; Days & NightsGuaranteed Hours
